QuestData.Title: Dropping In
QuestData.Description: Witch Lord Morkurk is no fool.$B$BHe has catapults set up throughout the foothills leading into their compound.$B$BNo matter, I have a way to handle them.$B$BTake out the ogres guarding the siege weapons and mark them once they're clear. I'm readying a vortex spell that will handle things from there.$B$BWe'll meet just outside their gate afterwards.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Magister Krelas destroy $1oa Gordunni Boulderthrowers.
QuestData.RewardText: Before we take on Morkurk we have some business to attend to in the fortress proper.
